name: svelte
title: Svelte
description: This extension helps you visit svelte documentation

commands.name: svelte-docs
commands.title: Svelte Docs
commands.description: Browse and search Svelte and SvelteKit documentation

commands.name: svelte-cli-builder
commands.title: CLI Builder
commands.description: Interactive CLI command builder for sv create and sv add

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: sikandar_bhide
